descript.abstract: Radiometric ages of geological materials by K-Ar, Rb-Sr, Sm-Nd, fission track, and U-Th-Pb dating methods. A revision of DDS-14 correcting locations and providing the data in more convenient formats.
descript.purpose: This database is a minor revision of DDS-14, with some corrections.

timeperd.current: Publication dates of the initial database (DDS-14) and the revision (OFR 2003-236).

theme.themekt: General glossary for mineral resources spatial data

browse.browsed: Sample locations in the conterminous United States, (768 x 512 pixels)

citeinfo.title: National geochronological and natural radioelement data bases

srcinfo.srccontr: Original database used by compilers of OFR-2003-236; corrections to some of the data are described at http://geopubs.wr.usgs.gov/open-file/of03-236/

procstep.procdesc: Copied information from OFR 2003-236, added documentation, reformatted, and in some cases eliminated duplication, eliminated explicit uninformative values (for example "Unk" in many fields). Created specialized interfaces and report formats as well as web services and download packages.

attr.attrdef: Record ID. Sample identifier, links site description with analytical results. Integer values. Int of width 5.

distinfo.distliab: This report is preliminary and has not been reviewed for conformity with U.S. Geological Survey (USGS) editorial standards or with the North American Stratigraphic Code. Any use of trade, firm, or product names is for descriptive purposes only and does not imply endorsement by the U.S. Government.
